Package org.apache.catalina.util.xml

Interface Summary
SaxContext SAX Context - used to match and perform actions provide access to the current stack and XML elements.
 

Class Summary
XmlAction Each rule in Xml Mapper can invoke certain actions.
XmlMapper SAX Handler - it will read the XML and construct java objects
